item.description:
Welcome to Our Circle of Friends!

We are a group of singles, ages 35+, who have a good time getting together and exploring all that life has to offer. We are open to new members and welcome the opportunity to meet new people.

Some events include dining out, outdoor activities, community service, dancing, and other enjoyable events. Sometimes we will open our events to children, which will be posted on the individual event page. Check out our calendar for upcoming activities.

We do have a few rules…what group doesn’t? They are listed below:

-Have Fun

-Be courteous and respectful of others

-Have Fun

-Pay your portion of the bill when dining out (this includes tip + tax)

-Have fun

-Contribute to the group by paying your yearly dues: $5.00*

-Have fun

-RSVP's - If you RSVP yes for an event, and your plans change please take the time to visit the site and change your RSVP. Or contact the event organizer.

-Have fun


So sign up for one of our upcoming events and make some new friends, have a good time and enjoy A Circle of Friends. We look forward to meeting you.

Your Organizer,
Donna (msdondon2003@yahoo.com)

Still not sure you want to join A Circle of Friends? Would you like to attend an event before joining? Feel free to contact me and I will be more than happy to have you attend as a guest.

* Wondering what the yearly dues are for?
In order to have a group on Meetup, the organizer has to pay a monthly site fee. The dues help to defray the cost of this for the organizers. Any excess money collected will be used toward defraying the cost of future events for all paying members.  The membership fee is non refundable.
item.name: A Circle of Friends
